about_the_game:
This DLC provides additional content for Horde Mode only.

Things are warming up! Well, that’s fine by us, because we know you’re ready to bring the heat. Deploy into two new maps and fend off rounds of relentless aliens with brand-new equipment, items, and perks.

2 New Maps


The ‘Crucible’ is our last bastion against the invaders. It’s a vital facility where we forge weapons to help defend earth, and it must be protected at all costs. It’s a great opportunity to make use of the scorching environment and submerge our little pink friends in molten iron. Mwahaha.

‘Steelworks’ is an industrial arena where the towers of the blast furnaces are located. Navigate yourself around carefully while luring aliens into overflow points where superheated steam and fire are being vented. Aliens are best served with a seasoned crisp!

New Weapon – Plasma Shotgun
Our latest invention the ‘Plasma Shotgun’ is an incredibly powerful weapon that afflicts plasma damage on our pink foes. It’s great to be armed with this beast of a weapon when you find yourself in a tight spot.

New Item – Bear Trap


It’s a bear trap but for aliens. This item deals immense damage while holding enemies in place temporarily, making for easy targets.

New Item – Napalm Mine


Things are getting serious. The general has just dropped us a Napalm Mine. This new item will inflict burning damage over a huge area. It’s equal parts epic, chaotic and fun.

New Perk – Protective Coveralls


Don’t find yourself in a sticky situation! Our scientists have been hard at work, and they’ve provided us with blueprints for a new type of outfit that will protect you against elemental damage types.

name: From Space - Mission Pack: Molten Iron

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: From Space - Mission Pack: Molten Iron - $4.99 $2.49

package_groups.title: Buy From Space - Mission Pack: Molten Iron

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) / Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB) / GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Sound Card or stronger
  • Additional Notes: Controller highly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-9590 (8 * 4700) / Intel Core i7-6700 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 (8192 MB) / GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4096 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Sound Card or stronger
  • Additional Notes: Controller highly recommended. The Recommended Specification listed above allows gameplay experience at 60 FPS on average while using High graphical settings at 1080p resolution

short_description: Mission Pack: Molten Iron is a DLC for From Space that will take your Horde Mode experience to the next level. Ramp up your gameplay with the addition of 2 new maps (Crucible and Steelworks), a weapon (Plasma Shotgun), 2 items (Bear Trap and Napalm Mine), and a perk (Protective Coveralls).
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
